thread.title: Good Central Manhattan Hotel
thread.title_full: Good Central Manhattan Hotel - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Fin5000
title: Good Central Manhattan Hotel
text: Stayed here for 5 days in November. Excellent Location, Walking Distance to many sights-5 mins to Central Park,10 mins to Times Square and two subways nearby. Two Great Irish bars nearby also. Room was a bit dated but was clean and daily housekeeping. Didn't spend too much time in room so was perfect for us. Staff on reception were helpful for directions etc. Also if going to JFK use the hotel car transfer-more comfortable and slight cheaper. Would recommend
